Draft Rating:

D-

Vlade Divac ranks in the 22th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Divac's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 9 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Justin James with 40th pick but was worth 23th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Marvin Bagley III with 2th pick but was worth 47th pick.
  • Drafted De'Aaron Fox with 5th pick but was worth 9th pick.

Trade Rating:

B

Vlade Divac ranks in the 67th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Artūras Gudaitis, Luka Mitrović, De'Aaron Fox to SAC.
  • Lost Carl Landry, Nik Stauskas, Jason Thompson, Jayson Tatum, Romeo Langford to PHI.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Tyreke Evans, Langston Galloway, Buddy Hield, Zach Collins, Frank Mason III to SAC.
  • Lost Omri Casspi, DeMarcus Cousins to NOP.

Signing Rating:

D-

Vlade Divac ranks in the 25th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Nemanja Bjelica in 2018.
  • Signed Rajon Rondo in 2015.
  • Signed Richaun Holmes in 2019.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Kosta Koufos in 2015.
  • Signed Justin Jackson in 2017.
  • Signed Cory Joseph in 2019.
